segment.source: List of supported hardware and software requirements for Internet Explorer 11 and the Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11.
segment.target: List of supported hardware and software requirements for Internet Explorer 11 and the Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11.

segment.source: Hardware and software requirements for Internet Explorer 11 and the IEAK 11 (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Hardware and software requirements for Internet Explorer 11 and the IEAK 11 (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Hardware and software requirements for Internet Explorer 11 and the IEAK 11
segment.target: Hardware and software requirements for Internet Explorer 11 and the IEAK 11

segment.source: Before you can use the Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 and the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11, you must first install Internet Explorer 11.
segment.target: Before you can use the Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 and the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11, you must first install Internet Explorer 11.

segment.source: For more info about installing IE11, see the Determine the licensing version and features to use in IEAK 11 page.
segment.target: For more info about installing IE11, see the Determine the licensing version and features to use in IEAK 11 page.

segment.source: Hardware requirements
segment.target: Hardware requirements

segment.source: Before you start the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11, you must check to see how much disk space you have on the drive you're going to use to build the IE11 install package.
segment.target: Before you start the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11, you must check to see how much disk space you have on the drive you're going to use to build the IE11 install package.

segment.source: This drive can be on the same device as the one running the wizard; it just needs to have a secure destination folder.
segment.target: This drive can be on the same device as the one running the wizard; it just needs to have a secure destination folder.

segment.source: Before you start to create your install package, you must meet all of the Internet Explorer 11 requirements, plus:
segment.target: Before you start to create your install package, you must meet all of the Internet Explorer 11 requirements, plus:

segment.source: Up to 100 megabytes (MB) of disk space, depending on how many components you include in the installation package.
segment.target: Up to 100 megabytes (MB) of disk space, depending on how many components you include in the installation package.

segment.source: An additional 100 MB of disk space for each custom installation package built.
segment.target: An additional 100 MB of disk space for each custom installation package built.

segment.source: Different media types are considered separate packages.
segment.target: Different media types are considered separate packages.

segment.source: Software requirements
segment.target: Software requirements

segment.source: The device you're going to use to build your install packages must be running Internet Explorer 11, on one of these operating systems:
segment.target: The device you're going to use to build your install packages must be running Internet Explorer 11, on one of these operating systems:

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: However, you must use the Windows 8.1 target platform and only the "Configuration-only package" is available.
segment.target: However, you must use the Windows 8.1 target platform and only the "Configuration-only package" is available.

segment.source: Windows 8.1
segment.target: Windows 8.1

segment.source: Windows Server 2012 R2
segment.target: Windows Server 2012 R2

segment.source: Windows® 7 Service Pack 1 (SP1)
segment.target: Windows® 7 Service Pack 1 (SP1)

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2 (SP1)
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 (SP1)

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: The device you're going to use to run IEAK 11 must be running the same version of the operating system as the device where you'll build your install packages.
segment.target: The device you're going to use to run IEAK 11 must be running the same version of the operating system as the device where you'll build your install packages.
